name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Comfortable lightweight Bermudas.  It has stretchy waist so remember to get a size smaller.

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: At 6'7" I find it hard to find shorts that fit well, and don't look too short due to my height, and these look great. Super comfortable, great in hot weather as made of quick dry material and fit loose Super affordable price as well. Have already bought 4 more pairs.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 2 February 2024

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: El short es muy cómodo, la talla queda a la perfección. La cintura tiene elástico y la tela se estira. Estoy pensando seriamente en comprar otro. Vale la pena 100%.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 13 May 2022

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I bought a very similar pair of Wrangler shorts at Wal-Mart and the fabric was much thicker and better quality than this pair.  These feel kinda cheap; the fabric feels like it could tear fairly easily while the store bought pair, despite being used heavily for cycling for months and washed many times are now faded but the fabric and stitching are fine.Edit to my previous post ...My previous opinion was that I wouldn't buy these again but now after using them for some time, the fabric is holding out very well .... still feel very light and the mesh pockets are a little shallow.  Still a decent short.  I do hope they come out with the original pair of Wrangler shorts I bought almost two years ago.  They have a much sturdier fabric though a little heavy in really hot summer days.  Sturdiness and good pockets mean more than style etc. to me.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 29 April 2020

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Bought 1 just to try out and loved 'em. They were a perfect fit for me. Lightweight, stretchy in all the right places and so comfortable. Will be buying 2 more pairs for this summer if/when they go on sale.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 13 February 2024

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Buena tela muy comoda
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 3 July 2022

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Tela comoda, tiene un par de bolsillos con cierre, en la parte de abajo
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 1 August 2022

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Size: I'm legit 38" if not a little more. A lot of the reviews say true to size so I ordered the 38".  If I lost a pound and jumped up and down they would have fallen to my ankles.  I guess if you like wearing a belt and like that really loose feel then stick to the 38".  I'm big shoulders no butt so I need that little bit of extra tension to keep my drawers up. I reordered the 36" and they fit great. Puts the "Flex" to a little but of test but that's what it's there for and it's comfortable. Also the smaller size looks better because the legs aren't so large. There was a huger difference between the 38" and 36".Performance: I usually graduate my clothes to "yard gear" after they have had a year or so of normal wear. I immediately put these to the test doing yard work and I will wear these from now on.  They were light which kept me cool, the waist was flexible but comfortably snug and the front pockets were deep enough to hold my phone with no issues. I push-mow a large yard and bag the clippings. My neighbors will appreciate that now when I bend over to remove the bagger they won't be confused that a plumber is doing my yardwork. Highly recommend these and also recommend the Flex version of the Wrangler jeans that are sized in a similar fashion.  I have bought another pair and will likely buy a few more. I would even work out at the gym in these when that time comes... maybe having these will motivate me to get there.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 April 2021

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Cómodo y elástico
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 12 May 2022

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I am able to wear shorts to work and I saw these and figured to give them a try.  First I must say, as a guy I am used to the demin or thick cotton feel for pants/shorts, these are not that feel. These are a stretchy material. When wearing them they are very comfortable and when you sit, as a guy the material is stretchy so you can sit down comfortably without issues. They look like regular shorts, I feel the waistband is a little wider but not in a bad way. I have washed this pair 3x now, they wash well, no fading or coming apart as I read in one review but they do look wrinkly, not bad enough to have to iron them, besides when you put them on the wrinkles seem to go away, I think its the stretchy material that makes them look that way. I paid $27 for this paid off shorts and it's about as hight as I would want to pay. I do need to mention that I did order a second pair, black as these are more of an olive color.  I hope this review helps.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 September 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I've been looking for a good pair of work shorts and these do fantastic. I'm a bigger guy doing HVAC installs in the south so I needed something that was COMFORTABLE, FLEXIBLE and BREATHABLE and these deliver on all 3. Due to the material the pockets take a bit of getting used to since they fit to form but with how well they perform in every other area I need them to I can't even list that as a con.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 October 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I was looking for shorts that were lightweight, wrinkle resistant, and flexible for a trip to Europe. I was also looking for extra pockets, but I don't like cargo pants with flaps or buttons. Wrangler had the perfect answer. These shorts fit great, and the material (mostly nylon) is lightweight and flexible. They come with two zipper pockets that are perfect for traveling or day-to-day. They are cut a bit narrow in the leg, which is fine for me (5'10", 170lb.) I bought granite (dark gray) and sagebrush (grayish green). I tried the bronze but didn't like the color. I wish they came in a lighter shade, like khaki or beige.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 August 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Well made black shorts with several pockets. Shorts fit well. But, are a bit long for my body.

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Husband works outdoors in a very physically demanding job. He would often get heat rash & make his working day MISERABLE. So, about 3yrs ago, bought a pair of these to see if they would be thinner, quick-dri, & comfortable.Viola!! No more heat rash but that big box store doesn't sell these any longer.  Amazon & Amazon Seller came through.We have these Wranglers and I have added AFTCO, Shallowful, & Huk *(YES, BUCEE'S really does have everything!*)  fishing pant/short & husband could t be happier.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 July 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Material feels light and has some stretch.  Cargo pockets have zippers.  Overall feels well made.  Just be aware, that the front pockets are in the front of the pants, not on the side (where your hands would naturally fall to put it in a pocket).
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 3 June 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I bought these for my son and now he has 4 pair!  They fit well, the pockets are deep and not bulky like most cargo shorts.  He loves them and so do I.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 September 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: First, the description of these cargo shorts on Amazon is totally inadequate. The absolutely most important feature of these shorts that is not evident on the Amazon web site is that they truly have STRETCH. I an a waist 33 and I ordered a 32. They fit perfectly since the waist and the pants have great stretch. They would also fit perfectly for someone with a 32 inch waist. Too many pants on the internet are described as having a stretch feature, but in fact do not. Secondly, there is not description of the pockets. These shorts have 7 pockets, but you would not know it from the website. Zippers are on the two side cargo pockets so you can secure your phone and wallet in these pockets if you will be exercising. The other pockets are deep, as is the "watch" pocket. Great fabric. I reordered another pair after wearing the first pair. Can't address durability, but they are made much better than my other cargo shorts. Great buy!!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 18 June 2022

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Tissu élastique, léger et respire bien. J'adore. Je ne jure que par ce modèle/marque
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 19 November 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I wear pants and boots almost everyday and I was looking for something that was flexible and tough. Pockets are not too deep nor too shallow and the waist band is wide enough that it does not roll down or slip down without a belt unless you overload the pockets. I have purchased several of these shorts replacing several different brands. I even purchased them for friends who have in turn ordered more.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 July 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I liked that there were lots of useful pockets on these shorts. I have used them as day to day wear as well as using them as a bathing suit. Quite stretchy so if you are active then they will stretch to allow a bit more room to move. Not that fond of the dome like fastener instead of a button but we will see how long they last. Will buy again when the time comes. Good price.

reviews: These are flexible and look great.  The fit and length are perfect, exactly what I was looking for.  A nice pair of casual summer shorts.  They very quickly became my go to shorts.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 15 October 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I wanted shorts that were comfortable and kids could wear to school.  They don't like pants and it's not very cold here. They looks really nice.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 5 September 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I really like these shorts. They are comfortable and the material lightweight and breathable. I'd give this product 5 stars except for the defective waistband snap. It just won't stay snapped and will un-snap at the slightest pressure, like me bending over to pick something up off the floor. It's not just a 'one-off' bad pair of shorts - I ordered two pairs and both have this same problem. If I wear a belt then the belt takes the tension and the pants stay snapped, but the snap should be better designed and not require 'help' to stay closed.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 July 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: The fit is comfortable, no "baggyness" and the fabric has give to it so hikes and long walks should be comfortable.  With the exception of two of the front pockets which are shallow and up high on the shorts, there is ample space for your keys, wallet and phone.  Pretty nice product for the price.  Certainly a lot less expensive than the Lululemon Men's hiking shorts.  Let's see how they last.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 May 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I recently bought a pair of Wrangler "Outdoor Series" cargo shorts on clearance at a local Target store, model NT980GT. I really like the fit and the fabric and the zipper side pockets. Come to find out they were discontinued, but my searches kept bringing me back to these Wrangler "Authentics" cargo shorts, model ZM980GT. After carefully looking at the pictures and comparing them to my Outdoor Series pair, the pockets, the stitching, etc, appeared to be exactly the same. So I bought a pair in the hopes they were.While almost identical, this newer Authentics version is a little different than those discontinued Outdoor Series pair. First, they're about an inch longer. Not a huge difference, but I'm 6'2" and I prefer where the Outdoor Series shorts sit above my knee. The second thing I noticed is they're slightly slimmer in fit, just a little less room around. And the waistband seems less stretchy. They clearly went cheap on the new zippers. Most people won't notice or care, but after having the better, lock-down zipper heads on the Outdoor Series, these cheap floppy zipper heads are just annoying to me. And while both shorts are listed as Granite (GT), these are lighter in color.Honestly though, for all my moaning about these slight differences, if I didn't already have the older version I wouldn't know and would be perfectly happy with these shorts. They are still just as comfortable, made with the same nylon/spandex mix, and seem just as well stitched together. Knowing the differences, my only real gripe is the zippers. Still very comfortable and well fitting shorts.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2018

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Stretchy, excellent fit, my husband doesn’t like any other shorts but these! Hopefully they stay available for a long time!Bought him 3 pairs 2 years ago and they just started ripping after years of working construction. Bought 3 more pairs last week and they haven’t changed!
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 5 August 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: So they're the most comfortable shorts I've ever worn, But. They don't hold up all that great, Atleast not in comparison to traditional wrangler shorts. They could easily be used as swim trunks and they feel like a mixture of that and normal shorts. Pockets functioned better than expected and I'll buy another pair to see if they'll share the same weak points such as inner thighs and the taint seam. Every now and then I get a loose thread too, No big deal but something you'd notice if bought. Would recomend going a size up if you've owned a pair previously, Bought my second pair and initial fit is awful. I'm sitting with them on to write this review incase another larger gentleman is considering these shorts. GO A SIZE UP. Other than that they were good enough to want another pair, So there's that. They'll definitely appear tight in your normal size, They hug pretty good so larger size won't hurt.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 May 2021

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Very well made with plenty of pockets, excellent for the summer days.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 20 August 2023
